item.description:
Start off your New Year in style at NetSAP Boston's 2013 Kick Off January Cocktails & Conversations (C&C) event at the District Lounge.

Throw on your classiest duds and come join us for an evening of fun.

Network with new people, reconnect with old friends and get social at this splendid location.

The festivities begin at 8pm.

Members: Free | Non-Members: $10

Signup for your annual membership at: http://na.netip.org/members/join OR
buy your membership at the venue

You can join in the conversation and see who is going by RSVP'ing on facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/events/116189518550793/

Network of South Asian Professionals Mission: Bringing South Asians together to foster friendships and engage in professional networking, community service and political and cultural activities
item.name: NetSAP Boston's kickoff Cocktails & Conversations Party!
